file.name: whapi.com-locations-2.0-swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  contact:
    x-twitter: WilliamHill
  description: The Locations API is a collection of methods that support geographical
    information. The first method is an address lookup service for UK addresses.
    This service can be used to provide a new customer with a list of possible
    addresses from which they can populate a registration form.
  title: Locations
  version: "2.0"
  x-apisguru-categories:
    - entertainment
  x-logo:
    url: https://twitter.com/WillHillHelp/profile_image?size=original
  x-origin:
    - format: swagger
      url: https://developer.williamhill.com/wh-docs/docs-sdks/locations/swagger/docs
      version: "2.0"
  x-providerName: whapi.com
  x-serviceName: locations
security:
  - apiKey: []
paths:
  /address/lookup/:
    get:
      description: >
        Retrieves a list of addresses when supplied with a house number or name
        and a postcode. It is generally used during customer registration to
        provide a list of possible addresses from where the customer can select
        their own address details.
      operationId: addressLookup
      parameters:
        - description: House number or name of the address.
          in: query
          name: houseNum
          required: true
          x-eg: 4
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: Postcode of the address, no spaces required.
          in: query
          name: postCode
          required: true
          x-eg: GX11AA
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/addresses"
              examples:
                response:
                  value: |
                    {
                      "addresses": 
                      [
                        {
                          "fullAddress": "4 Bywater Place, LONDON, SE16 5ND",
                          "street": "4 Bywater Place",
                          "postcode": "SE16 5ND",
                          "city": "London",
                          "county": "London"
                        }
                      ]
                    }        
        "400":
          description: Missing or Invalid Parameter
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/locationsErrors"
              examples:
                response:
                  value: |
                    {
                      "errors":
                      [
                        {
                          "code":"10070",
                          "message":"Missing Parameter",
                          "field":"postCode"
                        },
                        {
                          "code":"10071",
                          "message":"Invalid Parameter",
                          "field":"postCode"
                        }
                      ]
                    }
        "404":
          description: Address not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/locationsErrors"
              examples:
                response:
                  value: |
                    {
                      "errors" : 
                      [
                        {
                          "code":"20301",
                          "message":"Could not find any addresses",
                          "field":"postCode"
                        }
                      ]
                    }
      tags:
        - Locations
      x-canReturnErrors:
        - 20301
        - 20303
        - 10070
        - 10071
  /countries/:
    get:
      description: Retrieves a list of countries and its currencies.
      operationId: getCountries
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/countries"
              examples:
                response:
                  value: |
                    {
                        "countries": 
                        [
                            {
                                "code": "GB",
                                "name": "United Kingdom", 
                                "currencyCode" : "GBP", 
                                "dialCode" : "+44"
                            }
                        ]
                    }
        "400":
          description: Missing or Invalid Parameter
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/locationsErrors"
              examples:
                response:
                  value: |
                    {
                        "errors" : 
                        [
                            {
                              "code":"10070",
                              "message":"Missing Parameter",
                              "field":"postCode"
                            },
                            {
                              "code":"10071",
                              "message":"Invalid Parameter",
                              "field":"postCode"
                            }    
                        ]
                    }
        "404":
          description: Country/Countries not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/locationsErrors"
              examples:
                response:
                  value: |
                    {
                        "errors" : 
                        [
                            {
                              "code":"20303",
                              "message":"Country not Found"
                            }
                        ]
                    }
      tags:
        - Locations
      x-canReturnErrors:
        - 20303
  "/countries/{countryCode}":
    get:
      description: Retrieves the specified country and its currency.
      operationId: getCountry
      parameters:
        - description: Code of the country
          in: path
          name: countryCode
          required: true
          x-eg: GB
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/country"
              examples:
                response:
                  value: |
                    {
                      "code":"gb",
                      "name":"Great Britain",
                      "currencyCode":"GBP",
                      "dialCode":"+44"
                    }
        "400":
          description: Missing or Invalid Parameter
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/locationsErrors"
              examples:
                response:
                  value: |
                    {
                        "errors" : 
                        [
                            {
                              "code":"10070",
                              "message":"Missing Parameter",
                              "field":"postCode"
                            },
                            {
                              "code":"10071",
                              "message":"Invalid Parameter",
                              "field":"postCode"
                            }    
                        ]
                    }
        "404":
          description: Country/Countries not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/locationsErrors"
              examples:
                response:
                  value: |
                    {
                        "errors" : 
                        [
                            {
                              "code":"20303",
                              "message":"Country not Found"
                            }
                        ]
                    }
      tags:
        - Locations
      x-canReturnErrors:
        - 20303
        - 10070
        - 10071
  /currencies/:
    get:
      description: Retreives the list of currencies.
      operationId: getCurrencies
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/currencies"
              examples:
                response:
                  value: |
                    {
                      "currencies": 
                      [
                        {
                          "code":"GBP",
                          "name":"Pound",
                          "minDeposit":"5.00",
                          "maxDeposit":"100.00",
                          "minWithdrawal":"20.00",
                          "maxWithdrawal":"1000.00",
                          "exchangeRate":"1.00"
                        }
                      ]
                    }
        "404":
          description: Currency not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/locationsErrors"
              examples:
                response:
                  value: |
                    {
                        "errors" : 
                        [
                            {
                              "code":"20304",
                              "message":"Currency not Found"
                            }
                        ]
                    }
      tags:
        - Locations
      x-canReturnErrors:
        - 20304
  "/currencies/{currencyCode}":
    get:
      description: Retreives the specified currency.
      operationId: getCurrency
      parameters:
        - description: Code of the currency
          in: path
          name: currencyCode
          required: true
          x-eg: GBP
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/currency"
              examples:
                response:
                  value: |
                    {
                        "code":"GBP",
                        "name":"Pound",
                        "minDeposit":"5.00",
                        "maxDeposit":"100.00",
                        "minWithdrawal":"20.00",
                        "maxWithdrawal":"1000.00",
                        "exchangeRate":"1.00"
                    }
        "400":
          description: Missing or Invalid Parameter
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/locationsErrors"
              examples:
                response:
                  value: |
                    {
                        "errors" : 
                        [
                            {
                              "code":"10070",
                              "message":"Missing Parameter",
                              "field":"postCode"
                            },
                            {
                              "code":"10071",
                              "message":"Invalid Parameter",
                              "field":"postCode"
                            }    
                        ]
                    }
        "404":
          description: Currency not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/locationsErrors"
              examples:
                response:
                  value: |
                    {
                        "errors" : 
                        [
                            {
                              "code":"20304",
                              "message":"Currency not Found"
                            }
                        ]
                    }
      tags:
        - Locations
      x-canReturnErrors:
        - 20304
        - 10070
        - 10071
x-customerrors:
  - code: 20301
    message: Could not find any addresses
    status: 404
  - code: 20302
    message: Result limit has been exceeded
    status: 400
  - code: 20303
    message: Country not found
    status: 404
  - code: 20304
    message: Currency not found
    status: 404
x-docchapters:
  - fieldSelection
  - apiSummary
  - headAndOptions
  - docsAndSdks
  - errorHandling
  - statusCodes
servers:
  - url: https://sandbox.whapi.com/v2/locations
components:
  parameters:
    apiKey:
      description: A unique identifier of your application that is generated by the API
        portal and presented in the header.
      in: header
      name: apiKey
      required: true
      x-eg: l7xxa54460c573b5497c9b24b505xxxxxxxx
      schema:
        type: string
    countryCode:
      description: Code of the country
      in: path
      name: countryCode
      required: true
      x-eg: GB
      schema:
        type: string
    currencyCode:
      description: Code of the currency
      in: path
      name: currencyCode
      required: true
      x-eg: GBP
      schema:
        type: string
    houseNum:
      description: House number or name of the address.
      in: query
      name: houseNum
      required: true
      x-eg: 4
      schema:
        type: string
    postCode:
      description: Postcode of the address, no spaces required.
      in: query
      name: postCode
      required: true
      x-eg: GX11AA
      schema:
        type: string
  securitySchemes:
    apiKey:
      description: A unique identifier of your application that is generated by the API
        portal and presented in the header.
      in: header
      name: apiKey
      type: apiKey
  schemas:
    address:
      properties:
        city:
          description: The name of the postal city/town
          type: string
        county:
          description: The name of the county
          type: string
        fullAddress:
          description: The customerâ€™s complete address including postcode
          type: string
        postCode:
          description: The postcode of the address
          type: string
        street:
          description: The name of the street including the house number/house name
          type: string
      title: address
      type: object
    addresses:
      properties:
        addresses:
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/address"
          type: array
      type: object
    countries:
      properties:
        countries:
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/country"
          type: array
      type: object
    country:
      properties:
        code:
          description: The code of the country
          type: string
        currencyCode:
          description: The currency code
          type: string
        dialCode:
          description: The dial code of the country
          type: string
        name:
          description: The name of the country
          type: string
      title: country
      type: object
    currencies:
      properties:
        currencies:
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/currency"
          type: array
      type: object
    currency:
      properties:
        code:
          description: The code of the currency
          type: string
        exchangeRate:
          description: The exchange rate for the currency
          format: double
          type: number
        maxDeposit:
          description: The maximum deposit for the currency
          format: double
          type: number
        maxWithdrawal:
          description: The maximum withdrawl for the currency
          format: double
          type: number
        minDeposit:
          description: The minimum deposit for the currency
          format: double
          type: number
        minWithdrawal:
          description: The minimum withdrawal for the currency
          format: double
          type: number
        name:
          description: The name of the currency
          type: string
      title: currency
    error:
      properties:
        code:
          description: A unique William Hill identifier for the error
          type: string
        field:
          description: To help pinpoint the exact parameter where a request has failed
          type: string
        message:
          description: A unique William Hill text string to enable you to identify the
            error (in English only)
          type: string
      type: object
    locationsErrors:
      properties:
        errors:
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/error"
          type: array
      type: object
